snippet: The Hiriko Fold resembles other electric microcars, but the podlike E.V. has a hinged body, which can retract its front and rear modules. That shrinks the eight-foot-long car to five feet, making parking easier.
abstract: Hiriko Fold electric microcar sets itself apart from its competitors with hinged body that can retract and fold to allow for easier parking in tight spaces; Fold shrinks from eight feet to five feet, fitting about three and a half of the vehicles in a typical parking space.
lead_paragraph: The Hiriko Fold resembles other electric microcars, but the podlike E.V. has a hinged body, which can retract its front and rear modules. That shrinks the eight-foot-long car to five feet, making parking easier.
